long_description: The svelte Selle Italia SLR TT saddle features a low-profile, semi-flat shape and ultralight construction to save grams without compromising comfort. The long-lasting, abrasion-resistant full-grain leather cover ensures ultimate comfort and dependable performance through the miles. EVA foam padding is used to offer a measure of cushioning without a significant weight penalty. Titanium rails and 30% carbon content make the saddle feathery light. The Selle Italia SLR TT saddle is handmade in Italy.
short_description: The svelte Selle Italia SLR TT saddle features a low-profile, semi-flat shape and ultralight construction to save grams without compromising comfort.
